title: Whenever I turn on Hotspot connection speed drops to below .5Mbps
content:
Hey all, 
Whenever I turn on Hotspot connection on my Pixel 4 the speed drops to below .5Mbps
This seems to be time sensitive, 1st thing in the morning it's fine. I suspect it's the Network which is Three UK. 
Is there anyway to test this. They tell me something different every time. Or that it's probably the phone. 
If it is slowly down it must be them throttling, but they say they don't this on unlimited data accounts. 

Anyone have any suggestions?
